page.title: 03BRADWELL VILLAGE
page.content: {*}I think it is a very quiet place.The main road makes Braintree and Colchester easily accessible.Bradwell is divided into two small villages,the new village,where there is the village shop,pub and playing field,and Perry Green,the old village,consisting of several farmhouses. {*}Two new houses are being built in Bradwell.I don't think people mind because there used to be a pig farm there and I think that people would rather look at houses than pigs.A few men in the village have jobs on the site building them or plumbing and plastering. {*}If you pass through the village past the church you find a gravel pit owned by the Associated Roadstone Company. They have a private road half-way between the pit and the village so the lorries do not really bother us.
